useCase.name: User adjusts privacy and data settings
useCase.trigger: User requests to access privacy settings

mainSequence.step: User requests to access privacy settings
Storage returns current settings back to Settings
Settings display current privacy settings to GUI
GUI showcases privacy settings options to User
User adjusts privacy and data settings in GUI
GUI updates settings as per User's request
Settings saves new settings to Storage
Settings confirms the update to User
GUI displays success message to User
